Header.title: More than just a Digital Marketing Agency, Meet your new Digital Partners
Header.paragraph: Say hi to Perpetual Strats. Based in Delhi NCR, we are a full-service, digital marketing company and solutions agency delivering reach to global and local brands..

About.paragraph: Perpetual Strats is a performance-based digital marketing agency catering to clients from, The India, US, United Kingdom, France, Germany, The Netherlands, UAE, Hong Kong, Australia and many more. We drive your business success value through tailor-made digital marketing solutions. Our solutions are based on a deep understanding of your goals, environment, business model and customers. We deliver innovative campaigns through an integration of SEO, design & development, content creation and social media. work with us and watch your business benefit from the latest trends in digital marketing and analytics.

Services.name: SEO
Services.text: Our SEO-expert approach is to create a detailed plan based on a thorough, site and market review. So, we push hard to get the highest impact on SEO, with minimal changes. Organic search remains a moving target, and being a professional SEO agency.

Services.name: Web Analytics
Services.text: Use Perpetual Strats's Google Analytics Certified Professionals to help you audit and improve website analytics for your business. Create custom data analytics reports within Google Analytics, Google Data Studio or Tableau.

Services.name: Email Marketing
Services.text: Perpetual Strats is focused on broadening that communication strategy which revolves around your targets and objectives, thus aiding you to meet the effective results. It is our belief that email marketing acts as an umbrella to hold all other digital marketing strategies together.

Services.name: Social Media Services
Services.text: Being a social media agency, we understand how the absence of an effective social media advertising can severely affect your digital marketing campaign, rendering it almost handicapped. The sole aim is to put your brand ahead by making ample use of all the digital assets currently available.

Services.name: User Experience Design
Services.text: Every touchpoint your customer has with your brand gives shape to his experience. Every good user experience is the result of intensive research, human touch and a design which works as efficiently as it should.

Services.name: Web Development
Services.text: Development Consulting, API Development, Front-end Development, Mobile Development, CMS Development, Support and Maintenance

Features.title: Technical SEO Services
Features.text: Technical SEO is the backbone and the foundation on which the success of all your online marketing efforts depends. With the evolution of Search Engines.

Features.title: Google Web Analytics
Features.text: Email marketing is easily that dynamic medium which can be targeted, actively generated, automated, and assessed. And Perpetual Strats is dedicated to deliver you satisfaction.

Features.title: Pay-per-click Marketing
Features.text: With the ever evolving technology, your customer's choice of platforms and understanding his intent, managing PPC accounts effectively is not an easy job.

Features.title: Social Media Marketing Services
Features.text: At Perpetual Strats we understand the worth of significant social activity and thus, have our team of digital marketing experts handling core social media platforms.
